casebody.data:
Kevin S. LASECKI, Plaintiff,
v.
Stacey M. LASECKI, Defendant. No. COA17-544 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: October 17, 2017

Kevin S. Lasecki ("Plaintiff") appeals from the trial court's order holding him in civil contempt of court. We vacate and remand.

VACATED. REMANDED.
